scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Entombment of Christ. Christ's body, marked with wounds, is being laid into a sarcophagus by two men. The Virgin Mary, with a sorrowful expression, stands behind Christ, attended by another woman. Two other men are present, one on the left holding a cloth, and another on the right assisting with the body. A wooden cross is visible in the background, suggesting the crucifixion has just occurred. The setting is an outdoor landscape with rolling hills under a blue sky.
